name: acbt-comic-book-tools
description: ACBT - Command-line conversion and creation tools for comic book files

scripts.dist: echo 'Making windows and linux builds on linux' && npm run dist:cross-windows && npm run dist:cross-linux
scripts.dist:linux: echo 'Making linux build on linux' && npm run 7zbin:linux && npm run build:linux
scripts.dist:windows: echo 'Making windows build on windows' && npm run 7zbin:windows && npm run build:windows
scripts.dist:cross-linux: npm run 7zbin:linux && npm run sharp:linux && npm run canvas:linux && npm run build:linux
scripts.dist:cross-windows: npm run 7zbin:windows && npm run sharp:windows && npm run canvas:windows && npm run build:windows
scripts.7zbin:linux: shx chmod +x node_modules/7zip-bin/linux/x64/7za && shx mkdir -p dist/linux/bin && shx cp node_modules/7zip-bin/linux/x64/7za dist/linux/bin/7za
scripts.7zbin:windows: shx mkdir -p dist/windows/bin && shx cp node_modules/7zip-bin/win/x64/7za.exe dist/windows/bin/7za.exe
scripts.licenses: license-checker > licenses/node_modules.txt && shx sed -i 's/path.*node_modules/path: node_modules/' ./licenses/node_modules.txt && shx sed -i 's/licenseFile.*node_modules/licenseFile: node_modules/' ./licenses/node_modules.txt

author: Álvaro García (www.binarynonsense.com)
